import React from 'react' import MainHeader from '../MainHeader/MainHeader' import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next' import styles from './MainShop.module.scss' import Back from '../../assets/images/will_updata.png' import black from '../../assets/images/clothes.jpg' const MainShop = () => { const {t} = useTranslation() return (

{t('make_happy')}

{t('spec_clothes')}

) } export default MainShop
